in_ports.name: input
in_ports.caption: optional input
in_ports.hint: If specified, this function simply returns a copy of this array (other arguments are ignored).

out_ports.name: size_x
out_ports.hint: X-size of created rectangle (see also "sizeX" parameter).

out_ports.name: size_y
out_ports.hint: Y-size of created rectangle (see also "sizeY" parameter).

controls.name: minX
controls.description: If not specified, it will be equal to default value −2^62+1, which can play a role of negative infinity in most cases.

controls.name: maxX
controls.description: If not specified, it will be equal to default value 2^62−1, which can play a role of positive infinity in most cases.

controls.name: sizeX
controls.description: If specified, the previous parameter is ignored; maxX will be equal to minX+sizeX−1.

controls.name: minY
controls.description: If not specified, it will be equal to default value −2^62+1, which can play a role of negative infinity in most cases.

controls.name: maxY
controls.description: If not specified, it will be equal to default value 2^62−1, which can play a role of positive infinity in most cases.

controls.name: sizeY
controls.description: If specified, the previous parameter is ignored; maxY will be equal to minY+sizeY−1.
